description: Generates the outline for a Five Room Dungeon to be used in a tabletop roleplaying game (TTRPG).

input_variables.name: game_system
input_variables.description: The TTRPG game system for which the encounter will be designed.

input_variables.name: input_context
input_variables.description: Events, locations, NPCs, items and players to consider when designing the Five Room Dungeon.
